Good Comments: Great subs for the episodes I watched by them (16-20), although no karaoke was present.
Can't say they're great (questionable TL, no TL for OP/Ending, no karaoke) but they get the job done.  Although not as great as Ayako or gg, they got the job done.
Bad Comments: Good quality, readable font but some questionable TL. ^_^
Good text, and very good encode.
i felt the translation, and jokes were very well translated without leaving a feeling of missed puns
